#summary Returns grid user stats.
#labels Protocol-User

= Request Format =

|| *Parameter* || *Description* || *Type* || *Required* ||
||`RequestMethod`||!GetUserStats||String||Yes||

{{{
RequestMethod=GetUserStats
}}}

= Response Format =

|| *Parameter* || *Description* || *Type* ||
||`Success`||True if a !UserCount was returned, False if a Message was returned||Boolean||
||`UserCount`||Total count of user accounts||Integer||
||`Message`||Error message||String||


Success:

{{{
{
    "Success":true,
    "UserCount":42
}
}}}

Failure:

{{{
{
    "Success":false,
    "Message":"Database query error"
}
}}}
